headline: YPF Plans to Focus on Oil in 2025 With $3.3B Investment in Vaca Muerta
summary: YPF plans to invest $3.3 billion in the Vaca Muerta formation in 2025, with a focus on infrastructure enhancements and drilled but uncompleted wells.

raw.headline: YPF Plans to Focus on Oil in 2025 With $3.3B Investment in Vaca Muerta
raw.summary: YPF plans to invest $3.3 billion in the Vaca Muerta formation in 2025, with a focus on infrastructure enhancements and drilled but uncompleted wells.

headline: INEOS Energy completes the acquisition of oil and gas assets in US Gulf from CNOOC
summary: INEOS Energy has today announced the completion of the acquisition of the US Gulf business held by CNOOC Energy Holdings U.S.A. Inc., a U.S. subsidiary of CNOOC International Limited .The deal...
